effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, growing a Wild Mushroom at a nearby enemy's location at 100% effectiveness. Casting Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune always hits a Jackpot!.
Set: Starfall and Starsurge damage against targets affected by your Wild Mushroom's damage over time effect is increased by 20%.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Hood of Hungering Darkness

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description:
Blast your target with a ball of concentrated flame, dealing 169 Fire damage to an enemy or healing an ally for 169, then burn the target for an additional 75% of the damage or healing done over 6 sec.

Each cast of Concentrated Flame deals 100% increased damage or healing. This bonus resets after every third cast.
Max 2 Charges.

passive_spell_tooltip.description: Your spells and abilities have a chance to cauterize your target for 498 Fire damage over 10 sec or to heal an ally for 498 over 10 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to refund 50% of the Astral Power spent on them, heal you for 180, and increase your Versatility by 13 for 8 sec.

Each time any ally within 40 yds uses an Azerite Essence, gain 6 Intellect and 3 Haste for 20 sec.

The ally who used an Azerite Essence also gains 3 Haste for 20 sec. Only one ally can have this Haste effect at a time.

Unique: Corruption Resistance increased by 10.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

effects.display_string: Set: Your damaging spells have a chance to hit a Jackpot!, growing a Wild Mushroom at a nearby enemy's location at 100% effectiveness. Casting Celestial Alignment or Incarnation: Chosen of Elune always hits a Jackpot!.
Set: Starfall and Starsurge damage against targets affected by your Wild Mushroom's damage over time effect is increased by 20%.

name: Sleeveless T-Shirt
description: On the inside collar it reads, 'Inspected by Earl Z. Moade.'

spells.description: Equip: Your gear cools with Woven Duskthread and gains 756 Versatility when over 80% health.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 81 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to Hype you up, granting 367 Haste up to 5 times. Upon reaching maximum Hype, amp it up by 100% for 15 sec before starting again.

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,452, further increased by 907 while you remain within its light.
Equip: Reduce Sanity loss within the Visions of N'Zoth by 80%.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase your Intellect by 506 for 15 sec. Requires the Heart of Azeroth. (Requires level 50 or below)
Use: Dispel any effects of N'Zoth's Corruption, and become immune to any further Corruption effects for 6 sec. (3 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Use: Plant your Theramore banner. (3 Min Cooldown)
